mapper.select: SELECT CUSTOMER_ID customerId, CUSTOMER_NAME customerName, PASSWORD password, SSN ssn, PHONE phone, CITY city, ADDRESS address, POSTALCODE postalCode, PHOTO photo FROM CUSTOMERS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID LIKE #{customerId} AND PASSWORD LIKE #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE CUSTOMERS SET PASSWORD = #{password}, PHONE = #{phone}, CITY = #{city}, ADDRESS = #{address}, POSTALCODE = #{postalCode} WHERE CUSTOMER_ID LIKE #{customerId}
mapper.select: INSERT INTO CUSTOMERS(CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, PASSWORD, SSN, PHONE, CITY, ADDRESS, POSTALCODE, PHOTO) VALUES(#{customerId}, #{customerName}, #{password}, #{ssn}, #{phone}, #{city}, #{address}, #{postalCode}, #{photo})

SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as rnum, c.CUSTOMER_ID customerId, c.CUSTOMER_NAME customerName, c.PHONE, c.CITY, c.ADDRESS, c.POSTALCODE, c.PHOTO FROM CUSTOMERS c, (select @ROWNUM:=0) A ORDER BY rnum desc LIMIT ${startRowNum}, 5
